column3: If I take death into my life, acknowledge it, and face it squarely, I will free myself from the anxiety of death and the pettiness of life - and only then will I be free to become myself.
Never chase a lie. Let it alone, and it will run itself to death.
I think life is sacred, whether it's abortion or the death penalty.
Because of indifference, one dies before one actually dies.

I would rather die a meaningful death than to live a meaningless life.

I believe that people would be alive today if there were a death penalty.
